SYN_1_7_8449:
[Indication]
Severe symptomatic tracheobronchomalacia.
[Anesthesia]
General Anesthesia.
[Description]
1. Flex bronch confirmed severe collapse. Purulent secretions aspirated.
2. Dynamic Y-stent placed via larynx, adjusted with rigid bronch.
3. Post-op imaging showed migration. Return to OR.
4. Rigid bronchoscopy performed. Dynamic stent removed.
5. Dumon Y-stent customized and deployed. Good position/patency confirmed.
[Plan]
Admit. 3% saline nebs. CXR.
